scripts.test: npm run localtest && npm run karma
scripts.tag: riot src/client/tag building/client/tag && mv building/client/tag public/app/tag
scripts.compile: npm run tag && npm run lib && npm run client
scripts.develop: npm run clean; npm run prepare; npm run less && npm run compile && npm run webpack
scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run prepare; npm run less && npm run compile && npm run demock && npm run webpack && npm run uglify
scripts.prepare: mkdir building; mkdir building/lib; mkdir building/client; mkdir building/client/app; mkdir building/client/lib; mkdir building/client/tag
scripts.clean: rm -R building; rm -f public/app/main.css; rm -f public/app/bundle.js; rm -Rf public/app/tag
